column5: And some of it is free!!!  Just thought I would pass this along to fellow NiN fans here.  http://ghosts.nin.com/main/order_options  Click on the free (Radio Box), then click continue.  You will be emailed a link to download the tracks..   this is an instrumental album...  Here is more info on it's creation...  http://tech.blorge.com/Structure:%20/2008/...ine-experiment/  Gerritt.
Thanks Gerritt.....  It's great to see bands doing this.....Radio Head will have hopefully started a trend.  Cheers
It sound much like Downward Spiral.....but incomplete.  ...still pretty awesom!  Cheers
